snippet: Wall Street had a mixed close after volatile trading Friday after a weak report on the United States job market and continuing worries over a possible military strike against Syria.
lead_paragraph: Wall Street had a mixed close after volatile trading Friday after a weak report on the United States job market and continuing worries over a possible military strike against Syria.

headline.main: Markets Close Mixed, Buffeted by Jobs Data and Syria Concerns
headline.print_headline: Markets Close Mixed, Buffeted by Jobs Data and Syria Concerns
